h1_title: How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses
h2_title: How to Find Cyan Loong - Chapter 3 Dragon Boss
content: You'll need to wait until you can interact with the Shrine, but when you can, turn and face the water. As you walk toward it, you'll hear a voice again. Look toward the edge of the cliff and down to the left slightly, to see a Dragon Statue that sits by the water.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Secret_Loong_Dragon_Bosses.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Secret Loong Dragon Bosses', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Cyan Loong - Chapter 3 Dragon Boss'.
The content is as follows:
You'll need to wait until you can interact with the Shrine, but when you can, turn and face the water. As you walk toward it, you'll hear a voice again. Look toward the edge of the cliff and down to the left slightly, to see a Dragon Statue that sits by the water.
